entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET SDK 5.0.400 not available for Ubuntu 18.04 #19983
    untriaged, Area-Linux

Closed

  • manifest authoring or manifest reading is broken for the latest stage 0 #19866
    release blocking, Area-Workloads
  • MSBuild Reference tag to pull over the ijwhost.dll if it can detect the assembly is a C++/CLI assembly #19919
    Area-External, Backlog

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-103310-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • Test CI #19986
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • Fix sdkversion #19901
    Area-Workloads
  • Merge release/6.0.1xx #19985

    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19970
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19973
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19982
    Area-External
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19966
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19943
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19964
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

    Area-CodeFlow
  • "Cherry pick main changes"" #19980
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19974
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19968
